name: Artflex & Callie's Pet Store
description:
Merry Christmas 2021 Ethan & Callie!

How to play:

The goal is to satisfy your shop's customers!  Have a look at the prompt and click on the option you think best suits their needs.

Credits:

Gameplay Designer & Programmer - Zoë Pilgrim

2D Artist & Sound Designer - Nolan Pilgrim
